forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 29. West wind around 23 mph, with gusts as high as 38 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 41. West wind 22 to 26 mph, with gusts as high as 44 mph.

weather_report:
As the night deepens over Boston, the air carries a crisp bite—a harbinger of the chilly dawn ahead. The streets shimmer quietly beneath a faint veil as the city nestles into its slumber, but do not let the tranquillity fool you. The winds, bold and unyielding, will soon awaken, gusting fiercely from the west. This is a night where warmth becomes a luxury, and if you must step out to greet the morning, a snug coat, gloves, and a sturdy hat are your allies against the brisk embrace of the cooling atmosphere.

Come the light of day, Boston will unfurl beneath a bright azure sky, offering a straightforward cheerfulness. The sun will reign high, a welcome sight, yet the relentless winds will not forget their duty, bustling through the avenues and across the parks, making each step a brisk one. It beckons those who love the invigorating touch of nature to venture outside, perhaps for a brisk walk along the Charles River, where even the simplest act of strolling transforms into a spirited dance with the elements. Tailored layers will serve you well, as the warmth of the sun struggles against the cool whispers of the wind. Engage with your surroundings, grab a coffee from a local café, and allow this robust winter day to fill your senses with the vibrancy of the season, enriching the heart of a strong city.
